remarks: Formal linear combinations over Z/2Z are equivalent to finite subsets. _MOVABLE_ (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jul-2015.)
statement:
frlmpwfi.r $e |- R = ( Z/nZ ` 2 ) $.
frlmpwfi.y $e |- Y = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmpwfi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
frlmpwfi $p |- ( I e. V -> B ~~ ( ~P I i^i Fin ) ) $.
